CustomField.description: if Dev has at least one billable project assigned - green image, else - yellow
CustomField.formula: IF((Total_Billable_Projects__c >=1) ,(IMAGE("https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/F1_green_flag.svg/1280px-F1_green_flag.svg.png", "Dev has billable projec")) ,(IMAGE("https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQizenjEBUOiW4kwZIt_-w9Yp68kL0v64dAh2zq3miFJkr8_57NrF8PnbdngtyVgEA2CJQ&usqp=CAU", "Dev hasn't billable projec")))
CustomField.label: Is Billable?
